EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber}
Dear {!Case.Account}:
Your urgent reply is required. Your fuel account is significantly past due and needs payment to avoid any risk of further escalation.
We strongly encourage you to pay the full past due balance to bring the account current.
Total Owed on Account: {!Case.Rollup_Total_Owed_Amount__c} Minimum Due - Rev: {!Case.Minimum_Due_REV__c} Past Due Amount: {!Case.Rollup_Past_Due_Amount__c}
NOTE: Your account has more than 3 invoices outstanding. A full security deposit is now required and it is also now at risk of escalation to 3rd party collections.
This is our Last Attempt to contact you regarding these balance so act Immediately
Make a Payment TODAY
If you are not able to pay the balance in full at this time, please consider paying the oldest invoice to avoid 3rd party collections, or call us to request a weekly payment arrangement.
Online and Check-by-Phone payments made before 3:30EST will post same day.
We also accept ACH, Wire, or Western Union payments and have a separate Overnight address if you are mailing a physical check.
If you cannot make a payment please respond to this email or call today.
Receivables and Credit Management {!Case.Collections_Phone_Number__c}
